function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on questionnaires as the primary method for studying and measuring occupant health may lead to incomplete or biased data.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of occupant health and potential spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","Mitigation":"Use a combination of methods such as sensor technology, environmental monitoring, and medical tests to validate questionnaire data.","Technologies":"Sensor technology, environmental monitoring systems, medical testing equipment.","People":"Occupants, building tenants, researchers, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Researchers, building owners, healthcare professionals."},{"Description":"Major focus on office buildings in research studies and practice-based efforts may neglect other types of buildings that also impact occupant health.","Impact":"Limited understanding of occupant health in non-office buildings, potentially leading to unchecked spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Conduct research studies and implement practice-based efforts in educational, healthcare, and other building types to broaden understanding of occupant health.","Technologies":"Building performance assessment tools, environmental monitoring systems.","People":"Occupants, building owners, researchers, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Research organizations, building owners, healthcare organizations."}]}
